biography.bio: Rudolf Platte was born on February 12, 1904 in Hörde [now Dortmund], Germany as Rudolf Antonius Heinrich Platte. He was an actor, known for Veronika Voss (1982), Destination Death (1964) and The Buddenbrooks (1959). He was married to Marina Ried, Georgia Lind and Vally Hager. He died on December 18, 1984 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Rudolf Platte

biography.bio: Lore Calvies is an actress, known for Kaviar und Linsen (1967), The Sinful Bed (1973) and Der ewige Gatte (1969).
biography.name: Lore Calvies

biography.bio: Brigitte Dietz was born on September 30, 1939 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Kaviar und Linsen (1967), Blonde Engel sind nicht billig (1969) and Barschel: A Murder in Geneva (1993).
biography.name: Brigitte Dietz

biography.bio: Joachim von Ulmann was born on June 2, 1940. He was an actor, known for Kaviar und Linsen (1967), Caspar David Friedrich - Grenzen der Zeit (1986) and A Woman in Flames (1983). He died in 1992.
biography.name: Joachim von Ulmann

biography.bio: Sigrid Hackenberg was born on January 15, 1936 in Berlin, Germany. She was an actress, known for Tragödie in einer Wohnwagenstadt (1967), Mit Vollgas ins Glück - gehupt wie gesungen (1970) and Kaviar und Linsen (1967). She was married to Alexander Welbat. She died on June 9, 1980 in Hamburg-Eilbek, Germany.
biography.name: Sigrid Hackenberg

biography.bio: Oscar Sabo was born on August 29, 1881 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and writer, known for Die böse Schwiegermutter (1910), Er und sein Diener (1931) and Die endlose Nacht (1963). He died on May 2, 1969 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Oscar Sabo

biography.bio: Elisabeth Ried is an actress, known for Halluzinationen (1956), Mandala (1972) and Kaviar und Linsen (1967).
biography.name: Elisabeth Ried

biography.bio: Horst Jüssen was born on January 10, 1941 in Recklinghausen, Germany. He was an actor and writer, known for Klimbim (1973), Das Geständnis eines Mädchens (1967) and Die Kurpfuscherin (1974). He was married to Lena Valaitis. He died on November 10, 2008 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Horst Jüssen

biography.bio: Norbert Langer was born on March 9, 1941 in Silesia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Das Waisenhaus für wilde Tiere (2011), Hubert von Goisern - Wirtshaustour (2011) and Zone 51, Nevada, USA (2009).
biography.name: Norbert Langer

biography.bio: Charles Hans Vogt was born on June 14, 1906 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for L'arbre qui chante (1957), Der Umsetzer (1976) and Reifezeit (1976). He died on March 18, 1978 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Charles Hans Vogt

biography.bio: Ursula Alexa was born on September 13, 1921 in Berlin, Germany. She was an actress, known for Ludwig L (1971), Tagebuch eines Liebenden (1977) and Der Beginn (1966). She died on August 26, 1992 in Berlin.
biography.name: Ursula Alexa

biography.bio: Mathias Grimm was born on December 21, 1943 in Wernigerode, Germany. He is an actor, known for Der Kurier der Kaiserin (1970), Zirkus meines Lebens (1968) and The Miracle of Love (1968). He is married to Renate Pichler.
biography.name: Mathias Grimm
